subject: Wimbledon Tennis Tournament
Tennis
lead_paragraph: Lleyton Hewitt forced the 6-foot-8 Jerzy Janowicz out of his rhythm but ultimately lost in five sets in a match that consumed 3 hours 47 minutes over two days.
snippet: Lleyton Hewitt forced the 6-foot-8 Jerzy Janowicz out of his rhythm but ultimately lost in five sets in a match that consumed 3 hours 47 minutes over two days.
